name: minions
description: A universal structured object system for AI agents & systems

scripts.build: pnpm --filter minions-sdk run build && pnpm --filter minions-cli run build && pnpm --filter minions-docs run build && pnpm --filter minions-blog run build && pnpm --filter minions-web run build
scripts.deploy:blog: pnpm --filter minions-blog run build && netlify deploy --dir apps/blog/dist --prod
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter minions-sdk run build && pnpm --filter minions-sdk run lint && pnpm --filter minions-cli run lint
